interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2016/07/16
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Bill Pohlad'], 'Producers': ['Bill Pohlad', 'Claire Rudnick Polstein', 'John Wells'], 'Starring': ['John Cusack', 'Elizabeth Banks', 'Paul Dano'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']}
Review Text: The most interesting parts are in the recording studio, but the acting is also of a high standard: Elizabeth Banks is just great. The younger Brian Wilson is uncannily realistic, too.
Review Title: Elizabeth Banks is just great. The younger Brian Wilson is uncannily realistic
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
